choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
Here's a simple and healthy meal plan for you, assuming your diet doesn't have any specific restrictions:
```scss
Breakfast:
	* Whole grain toast with avocado and tomato slices
	* A cup of fresh fruit salad (mix of seasonal fruits)
Lunch:
	* Grilled chicken or fish sandwich on whole-grain bread
	* Side salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light vinaigrette dressing
	* Steamed vegetables (carrots, broccoli, green beans) as a healthy side option
Snack:
	* A small bowl of air-popped popcorn sprinkled with nutritional yeast for some extra flavor and zinc
Dinner:
	* Baked salmon or roasted chicken breast (skin removed) with herbs and lemon
	* Brown rice or quinoa as a healthy side option, cooked in vegetable broth for added nutrition
	* Steamed green beans or another non-starchy vegetable to accompany the meal
Snack (optional):
	* A small portion of Greek yogurt with some mixed nuts and dried fruits as a satisfying, protein-rich snack
```
